#include <cstdio>
#include <string>
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int a,x;
string s;
int main() {

        getline(cin,s);
        x=s.size();
        for(a=0;a<x;a++) {

            if(s[a]=='a' or s[a]=='e' or s[a]=='i' or s[a]=='o' or s[a]=='u') { printf("%c", s[a]); a+=2; }
            else { printf("%c", s[a]);}


        }


    return 0;
}
